skillsDescription: - MSc / BSc / PhD in a quantitative/scientific subject - Mixture of scripting languages (python,  R,  SQL) - Data Science experience - Experience of applying data solutions to complex business problems
companyDescription: A fantastic healthcare start up with exceptionally strong backing based in New York

jobPosting.title: Data Scientist,  Disruptive Healthcare Start Up

description: My client haven were established three years ago with the aim to seriously disrupt the the healthcare industry.  Due to huge success in their relatively short life,  amazing potential to scale and a large recent investment round they are looking for problem solving data scientists to help them continue to revolution.   They are working on a range of projects/topics and continuously looking for people who can identify and solve problems within healthcare utilising a range of data from fitness apps to Doctor ranking.  As a data scientist you will have had come from a strong quantitative background however will have an inquisitive mind as the role will see you facing a wide variety of business problems that you will be applying data driven solutions to.
